alert.note: Alert for Gila Bend; Sonoran Desert Natl Monument (Arizona) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.senderName: NWS Phoenix (Central Arizona and California Desert)
info.headline: Special Weather Statement issued August 16 at 4:13PM MST by NWS Phoenix
info.description: ...A strong thunderstorm will impact portions of Maricopa County through 515 PM MST... At 413 PM MST, Doppler radar was tracking a strong thunderstorm 11 miles north of Ajo, moving north at 5 mph. HAZARD...Wind gusts up to 50 mph and pea size hail. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Gusty winds could knock down tree limbs and blow around unsecured objects. Minor damage to outdoor objects is possible. This storm will remain over mainly rural areas of Maricopa County. This includes AZ Route 85 between mile markers 20 and 32. MAX HAIL SIZE...0.25 IN MAX WIND GUST...50 MPH
info.instruction: If outdoors, consider seeking shelter inside a building.

area.areaDesc: Gila Bend; Sonoran Desert Natl Monument
